channel.title: practice on Nathan R. Yergler
channel.description: Recent content in practice on Nathan R. Yergler

item.title: The Habit
item.description: A mentor, Naomi, once told me “it’s more fun to write programs that help you write programs than it is to write programs”.

item.title: Stumbling towards a drawing practice
item.description: I’ve been aware for some time that improving my drawing skills would probably have a big impact on all parts of my artistic practice.

item.title: Coffee Cup line study
item.description: Untitled (coffee cup line study): 4" x 5" linocut print I wanted to practice using lines to describe, rather than outline, shapes and surfaces, so I took a picture of a coffee cup on a sunny day and decided to try and make a print from it.

item.title: The OOT Killer
item.description: Recently I have been suffering from the delusion that making more commitments will make me more able to achieve them.
